entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
